patents.title: Smart Port IoT System for Container Tracking
patents.text:
ABSTRACT:
A smart port system utilizing IoT sensors for real-time container tracking and logistics optimization.

DESCRIPTION:
The invention relates to a comprehensive IoT-based monitoring system designed for maritime port operations. The system includes distributed sensors capable of tracking container positions, environmental conditions, and equipment status in real-time.

CLAIMS:
1. A system for tracking maritime containers comprising: a plurality of IoT sensors; a central processing unit; and a data transmission module.

patents.title: Autonomous Vessel Navigation System Using Machine Learning
patents.text:
ABSTRACT:
An autonomous navigation system for maritime vessels employing deep learning algorithms for collision avoidance and route optimization.

DESCRIPTION:
This invention presents a novel approach to autonomous vessel navigation using convolutional neural networks trained on AIS data.

CLAIMS:
1. A method for autonomous vessel navigation comprising: collecting sensor data; processing said data through a neural network; and generating navigation commands.
